explanation: [0-0] The scene is in a kitchen, a man in an orange polo shirt is holding a piece of chocolate, looking at the chocolate and smiling, his upper lip covered with chocolate sauce.
[0-2] Then the man closes his eyes and takes a bite of the chocolate. A hand holding a tissue appears and starts wiping the chocolate sauce from his mouth. The man looks to the side in surprise.
